description: Fixed a single note in the solo at bar 98 from fret 19 (note C) to fret 18 (note B) on the B string. That's how Michael Paget plays it in his video.
title: Waking The Demon

description: Fixed the solo to how Michael Padge actually plays it.
title: Waking The Demon

description:
-Bumped up the tempo by 2 bpm.
-Changed on of the harmonics to Pinch Harmonic.

description: Completely changed the bass tab, didn't sound right when comparing it to the original song. Anymore fixes are welcome! :)
title: Waking The Demon

description: Changed the solo harmony (sorry, it sounds different in GP6 than in Songsterr)
title: Waking The Demon

description: Fixed the slides I broke in my last revision, sorry
title: Waking The Demon

description:
Added rhythm guitar during chorus and solo, (partly) added solo harmony, changed finger bass to picked bass.
According to the playthrough BFMV did for Guitar World (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tRfNZAYH728), Matt's notes in measure 33 (and similar later in the song) should be 9--7 on the 5th string instead of 6--4 on the 4th (played by Padge in the playthrough), but on the album the 6--4 sounds more correct I thought, so I didn't change that. Also I know nothing of drums and bass, so no further changes were made there.
As for solo harmonies, I found the tab here (https://tabs.ultimate-guitar.com/tab/bullet_for_my_valentine/waking_the_demon_tabs_837045), and it sounds fine to me. The harmonies in measures 96 and 98, as a comment stated, I couldn't find, so I wasn't able to add those.
title: Waking The Demon

description: The corrections in this version basically are: the correction of certain parts in the guitars, both the one that was changed by the one that teaches Michael Padge in Youtube and some fragments that did not go in the respective guitar ... And the union of the tablaturas To what the band is originally, that is to say, two guitars.
title: Waking The Demon
